title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Energy Sustainability and Technology Education via Multidisciplinary Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can write multilingual project reports utilizing specialized terminology related to energy sustainability.
Learners can collaborate with interdisciplinary team members to design energy efficiency improvement solutions and present them through visual materials.
Learners can iteratively improve project outcomes based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
